description: Bob is a very cute young man from the UK who is so timid and shy it just makes Master Sebastian more eager to show him just how much he could have letting someone else take control and play with him. We find out a little about the boy before getting down to business, and we see he's like a lot of lads his age, though perhaps just a little more horny and daring than most. He might be regretting his decision to try something a little more exciting by the time Master has him blindfolded and roped up to the scaffolding, a flogger slapping against his back. He can cry out all he likes, Master is determined to have his way with him, bringing him down for a spanking and slowly stripping him naked. With his big floppy cock out and his bum red from all the spanking and slapping he's tied to the chair, ready for part 2!
title: Bob Steel & Sebastian Kane
